sentences.english: As the proverb says , idle young, needy old.
sentences.chinese: 正如諺語所說，“少壯不努力，老大徒傷悲。”

sentences.english: In good times and poor times, movies were my 4)lifesaver.

sentences.english: Audrey, you have given with my life tasted the Xibei.

sentences.english: It is a vexed question on the controversy of pessimism of history theory and optimism of history theory.

sentences.english: Accumulation of years of deep pain and great sorrow, I could not bear soon.

sentences.english: The interweavement of enjoyness and sadness makes up of the whole of ancient China"s aesthetic consciousness."

sentences.english: Is the fate of the tragedy, or transmigration of the pain.

sentences.english: Her five sons each cried bitter tears.

sentences.english: The result let me feel bittersweet.
No one can live in purely sad or happy life.
sentences.chinese: 沒有誰的生活會永遠單純的只有喜或只有悲。
君不見高堂明鏡悲白髮。
